titleStmt.title: Die saturni 13. Junij 1685 The Earl of Middleton aquaints the House ...
titleStmt.author: Middleton, Charles Middleton, Earl of, ca. 1650-1719.

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and first line of text.
Imperfect: tightly bound, dark, print show-through with loss of text.
Wing (2nd ed.) attributes to John Middleton, 1st Earl of Middleton, who died in 1674.
